title: Procurement for the supply of 340,000 Bottles of Human Albumin Solution 20% in 50ml Bottle
decision_details: - International Competitive Bids have been invited for the supply of 340,000 bottles of Human Albumin Solution 20% in 50ml Bottles, used to treat low blood volume (hypovolemia) and low albumin levels in blood. Two bidders have submitted bids for the same. The proposal made by the Minister of Health and Mass Media to award the relevant procurement to M/s Reliance Life Science (Pvt) Ltd., India, the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder, based on the recommendation of the Standing High-Level Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
